name: Dungeon II: Solstice
overview: Winter Solstice. The shortest day of the year. The symbolic death and rebirth of nature. This year however, something sinister has occurred. The Crow, a mysterious race of half-man, half-bird necromancers has stolen the sacred bough of mistletoe from the ancient stone triangle. It is the mystic key to keeping nature in balance. Without it there will be no new dawn and the world will remain in darkness, thus amplifying the power of the Crow.
